prompt:
Cinematic medium shot of a handsome young East Asian Wuxia swordsman standing in a bamboo forest, resemblance to a high-budget historical drama, messy windblown long black hair tied in a loose partial bun with stray wisps framing the face, sharp jawline, realistic skin texture with visible pores and subtle sweat sheen, stoic and contemplative expression with a gentle piercing gaze, soft golden hour lighting hitting the side of the face.

He is wearing traditional coarse grey linen robes, rough fabric texture with visible weave, layered garments with a tied waist sash, realistic folds and creases indicating movement and wear, relaxed posture, holding a sheathed sword with a wooden scabbard and fabric-wrapped hilt diagonally across the lower body, weathered hands with distinct veins.

Background features majestic hazy limestone karst mountains in the distance (Guilin style), soft focus bamboo leaves in the foreground and midground, atmospheric depth, volumetric fog, warm sunset rim lighting highlighting the hair strands, natural color palette with earthy tones, shot on Sony A7R IV with an 85mm f/1.4 GM lens, shallow depth of field, bokeh, film grain, hyper-detailed, 8k resolution, Kodak Portra 400 film stock aesthetic, photorealistic masterpiece.
